data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample PIKES-131

Exposition NE, Slope 8 deg, Geology: Granitschutt, Tree line 3600 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 1%, Herb cover 75%, Vegatation type: Tiefgr. ,lockerer Bestand. Homogen, Film number: 756A
